thread.section_title: Hotel Soft - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Short Break.
thread.title_full: Short Break. - Review of Hotel Soft, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mandy B
title: Short Break.
text:
Great hotel in a great location (just a 10 min walk to Gare du Nord or a 5 min walk to the Gare de l'est). Plenty of metro stops nearby. Hotel itself is situated down a quiet side road.
The hotel is clean and comfortable, with rooms cleaned daily. Bed was very comfortable.
Breakfast buffet was plentiful and tasty, the friendly staff replacing food and topping up the drinks regularly, the only slight downside was the small area which served as the breakfast room, however we never had to wait for a table.
All the staff that we encountered were very friendly and ready to offer advice when we asked, Dahmane in particular.
We will definitely stay here again and would recommend this hotel to anyone who needs a base from which to explore Paris..
